clothing.title: Classic Denim Jacket
clothing.description: This premium cotton denim jacket offers a modern, tailored fit perfect for any season. Features reinforced stitching, antique brass buttons, and four functional pockets. The fabric is durable yet soft, providing comfort without sacrificing style.
clothing.care: Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach.

food.name: Signature Truffle Burger
food.description: A juicy, flame-grilled beef patty topped with melted Swiss cheese, caramelized onions, wild mushrooms, and our house-made truffle aioli on a toasted brioche bun.

reviews.comment: Best burger I've ever had. Properties of the truffle oil are perfect.
Juicy and flavorful. The bun held up well.

education.name: Oakwood University
education.description: Oakwood University is a premier institution dedicated to academic excellence and global leadership. We provide a transformative educational experience that empowers students to shape the future.

onlineClasses.title: Creative Writing Masterclass: Storytelling 101

instructor.name: Prof. Elena Rodriguez
instructor.title: Award-Winning Novelist
instructor.bio: Prof. Rodriguez is a celebrated author with over 15 years of experience in creative writing and storytelling.

onlineClasses.description: Unlock your creative potential in this interactive live workshop. Learn the fundamentals of narrative structure, character development, and dialogue from an award-winning author.
